QuestData.Title: Take the Bull by the Horns
QuestData.Description:
I've carved out quite the reputation as a tauralus wrangler. Everyone needs a tauralus!
You do some work for me, and people will know who you are as well.
Take this bone splinter and poke a few juicy nibblers. Use them to lure a tauralus to you, then ride it back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride $1oa Bloodskin Tauraluses back to Dundae.
QuestData.RewardText: These are some good tauraluses. Thanks for the help, mortal!
